Spanish: Los temas de la conferencia son muy variados.
English: The topics of the conference are very diverse.

Spanish: Tener que ver con la literatura es su pasión.
English: To have to do with literature is his passion.

Spanish: El profesor planteó una discusión interesante en clase.
English: The teacher raised an interesting discussion in class.

Spanish: Valoramos mucho tu opinión en este asunto.
English: We highly value your opinion on this matter.

Spanish: Estaba vigilado por cámaras de seguridad en todo momento.
English: He was being watched by security cameras at all times.

Spanish: Me siento incómodo con la situación actual.
English: I feel uncomfortable with the current situation.

Spanish: Gasté todo mi dinero en ropa nueva.
English: I spent all my money on new clothes.

Spanish: No tolero cualquier tipo de amenaza en mi entorno.
English: I don't tolerate any kind of threat in my environment.

Spanish: El evento fue auspiciado por una reconocida marca de ropa.
English: The event was sponsored by a well-known clothing brand.

Spanish: Se comentaba que el nuevo restaurante era excelente.
English: It was said that the new restaurant was excellent.

Spanish: Este programa tenía la capacidad de interceptar mensajes de texto.
English: This program had the ability to intercept text messages.

Spanish: Los mensajes de texto de este tipo suelen ser malinterpretados.
English: Text messages of this type are often misunderstood.

Spanish: Ellos se encargan de velar por el cumplimiento de la ley.
English: They are in charge of ensuring compliance with the law.

Spanish: Me parece que deberíamos tomar una decisión pronto.
English: It seems to me that we should make a decision soon.

Spanish: Me registran en la entrada de la empresa.
English: They register me at the entrance of the company.

Spanish: Estaba expuesta a situaciones de riesgo en mi antiguo trabajo.
English: I was exposed to risky situations in my previous job.

Spanish: Se dice que el nuevo restaurante es el mejor de la ciudad.
English: It is said that the new restaurant is the best in the city.

Spanish: Poseer una gran fortuna conlleva una gran responsabilidad.
English: To possess a great fortune carries a great responsibility.

Spanish: El promedio de edad de los estudiantes es de 25 años.
English: The average age of the students is 25 years old.

Spanish: Intentaron disuadir a los ladrones con alarmas y cámaras de seguridad.
English: They tried to deter the thieves with alarms and security cameras.

Spanish: Reconocer el esfuerzo de los demás es importante para mantener un buen ambiente laboral.
English: Recognizing the effort of others is important to maintain a good work environment.

Spanish: Debemos darnos cuenta de que la educación es la clave para un futuro mejor.
English: We must realize that education is the key to a better future.

Spanish: Actuar con prudencia es fundamental en situaciones de emergencia.
English: Acting with caution is essential in emergency situations.

Spanish: No debemos permitir que invadan nuestra privacidad.
English: We must not allow them to invade our privacy.

Spanish: Los estafadores utilizan diferentes técnicas para engañar a las personas.
English: Scammers use different techniques to deceive people.

Spanish: Necesito renovar mi cédula de identidad.
English: I need to renew my identity card.

Spanish: Dejemos ese tema para otro día y enfoquémonos en la tarea actual.
English: Let's leave that topic for another day and focus on the current task.

Spanish: Lamentablemente, no podremos asistir a la reunión programada para hoy.
English: Unfortunately, we will not be able to attend the meeting scheduled for today.

Spanish: El atentado terrorista causó conmoción en toda la ciudad.
English: The terrorist attack caused shock throughout the city.

Spanish: Los heridos fueron trasladados de inmediato al hospital más cercano.
English: The injured were immediately taken to the nearest hospital.

Spanish: Los crímenes de odio deben ser condenados enérgicamente por la sociedad.
English: Hate crimes must be strongly condemned by society.

Spanish: El racismo es un problema que aún persiste en muchas sociedades.
English: Racism is a problem that still persists in many societies.

Spanish: Superar los obstáculos nos hace más fuertes y resilientes.
English: Overcoming obstacles makes us stronger and more resilient.

Spanish: Hay que ser cuidadoso al cruzar la calle, especialmente en zonas con mucho tráfico.
English: You have to be careful when crossing the street, especially in areas with heavy traffic.

Spanish: La convivencia pacífica entre vecinos es fundamental para una comunidad armoniosa.
English: Peaceful coexistence among neighbors is essential for a harmonious community.

Spanish: Los riesgos de la operación fueron evaluados minuciosamente por el equipo médico.
English: The risks of the operation were carefully evaluated by the medical team.

Spanish: Nos brindan información valiosa para tomar decisiones importantes.
English: They provide us with valuable information to make important decisions.

Spanish: Los peligros de la selva amazónica son numerosos e impredecibles.
English: The dangers of the Amazon jungle are numerous and unpredictable.

Spanish: Reabren el debate sobre la legalización de la marihuana.
English: They reopen the debate on the legalization of marijuana.

Spanish: Hacer preguntas es fundamental para obtener respuestas claras.
English: Asking questions is essential to get clear answers.

Spanish: Tomar decisiones importantes requiere tiempo y reflexión.
English: Making important decisions requires time and reflection.

Spanish: Entrevistar a personas influyentes puede ser una tarea desafiante.
English: Interviewing influential people can be a challenging task.

Spanish: El trabajo físico intenso puede cansar rápidamente a cualquiera.
English: Intense physical work can tire anyone quickly.

Spanish: Asegurar la victoria en el campeonato será un desafío para el equipo.
English: Ensuring victory in the championship will be a challenge for the team.

Spanish: Había fallecido hacía varios años, pero su legado perdura.
English: He had passed away several years ago, but his legacy endures.

Spanish: Comprobar la autenticidad de un documento es crucial en el proceso legal.
English: Verifying the authenticity of a document is crucial in the legal process.

Spanish: Los talones de pago se emiten al final de cada mes.
English: Pay stubs are issued at the end of each month.

Spanish: La adopción de un niño es un proceso lleno de amor y responsabilidad.
English: The adoption of a child is a process full of love and responsibility.

Spanish: Las personas que cumplen los requisitos recibirán una notificación por correo electrónico.
English: People who meet the requirements will receive a notification via email.

Spanish: ¿Los entrevistados mienten en las entrevistas? : No, siempre responden con honestidad.
English: Do interviewees lie in interviews? No, they always answer with honesty.

Spanish: Me temo que sí, levantar las sospechas sobre su participación en el robo.
English: I'm afraid so, raising suspicions about his involvement in the robbery.

Spanish: Pedir ayuda es un signo de fortaleza, no de debilidad.
English: Asking for help is a sign of strength, not weakness.

Spanish: Se encarga de la gestión de recursos humanos en la empresa.
English: He is in charge of human resources management in the company.

Spanish: Aportar nuevas ideas es fundamental para el crecimiento de la empresa.
English: Contributing new ideas is essential for the company's growth.

Spanish: Ir a la cárcel es una consecuencia grave de cometer un delito.
English: Going to jail is a serious consequence of committing a crime.

Spanish: Gracias por haber estado aquí.
English: Thank you for being here.

Spanish: Ha sido un placer.
English: It has been a pleasure.

Spanish: Igualmente.
English: Likewise.

Spanish: Brindamos servicios.
English: We provide services.

Spanish: Están de visita.
English: They are visiting.

Spanish: Enfrentaré el desafío con determinación.
English: I will face the challenge with determination.

Spanish: Asegurar el bienestar de nuestros empleados es nuestra prioridad.
English: Ensuring the well-being of our employees is our priority.

Spanish: Los compatriotas se reunieron para celebrar el Día de la Independencia.
English: The compatriots gathered to celebrate Independence Day.

Spanish: La siguiente reunión será el martes a las 10 de la mañana.
English: The next meeting will be on Tuesday at 10 in the morning.

Spanish: Tiene doble nacionalidad, es ciudadano de dos países.
English: He has dual nationality, he is a citizen of two countries.

Spanish: El consentimiento de los padres es necesario para el viaje escolar.
English: Parental consent is required for the school trip.

Spanish: ¿Puede traerse a su hijo a Estados Unidos durante las vacaciones?
English: Can you bring your son to the United States during the holidays?

Spanish: No dio su brazo a torcer y defendió su postura hasta el final.
English: He didn't give in and defended his position to the end.

Spanish: Obtuvo la victoria después de un arduo trabajo.
English: He achieved victory after hard work.

Spanish: Contrató a un abogado local para que lo representara en el juicio.
English: He hired a local lawyer to represent him in the trial.

Spanish: Estaba desesperada por encontrar una solución al problema.
English: She was desperate to find a solution to the problem.

Spanish: Se contactaron con el departamento de recursos humanos para obtener información.
English: They contacted the human resources department to get information.

Spanish: La custodia del niño fue otorgada a la madre.
English: Custody of the child was awarded to the mother.

Spanish: Desconocer las costumbres del país puede llevar a malentendidos.
English: Not knowing the customs of the country can lead to misunderstandings.

Spanish: Cometer una falta de prudencia puede tener consecuencias graves.
English: Committing a lack of prudence can have serious consequences.

Spanish: Me imagino que vas a llegar tarde a la reunión.
English: I imagine that you are going to be late for the meeting.

Spanish: Solicitaré un préstamo para comprar una casa.
English: I will apply for a loan to buy a house.

Spanish: Los problemas parecidos requieren soluciones diferentes.
English: Similar problems require different solutions.

Spanish: El acusado fue condenado a diez años de prisión.
English: The defendant was sentenced to ten years in prison.

Spanish: Las escopetas de alto calibre son utilizadas para cazar animales grandes.
English: High-caliber shotguns are used for hunting large animals.

Spanish: La fiscalía general está investigando el caso de corrupción.
English: The attorney general's office is investigating the corruption case.

Spanish: El informe constata que hubo un aumento en la tasa de desempleo.
English: The report confirms that there was an increase in the unemployment rate.

Spanish: El juicio por fraude comenzará la próxima semana.
English: The trial for fraud will begin next week.

Spanish: El juez dictaminó una sentencia ejemplar.
English: The judge issued an exemplary sentence.

Spanish: Los declaró culpables de robo a mano armada.
English: He declared them guilty of armed robbery.

Spanish: La extradición del fugitivo se llevará a cabo el próximo mes.
English: The extradition of the fugitive will take place next month.

Spanish: Los encarcelados recibieron visitas de sus familiares.
English: The prisoners received visits from their relatives.

Spanish: El país vecino ofreció ayuda humanitaria.
English: The neighboring country provided humanitarian aid.

Spanish: La empresa se compromete a proveer un ambiente laboral seguro.
English: The company is committed to providing a safe work environment.

Spanish: Los desafíos de la vida nos hacen más fuertes.
English: Life's challenges make us stronger.

Spanish: Trabajó arduamente para alcanzar sus metas.
English: He worked hard to achieve his goals.

Spanish: Después de correr un maratón, estaba agotado.
English: After running a marathon, he was exhausted.

Spanish: Estar abrumado por las responsabilidades puede afectar la salud mental.
English: Being overwhelmed by responsibilities can affect mental health.

Spanish: El apoyo de la comunidad fue abrumador.
English: The support from the community was overwhelming.

Spanish: Decidió prestar su coche a su amigo.
English: He decided to lend his car to his friend.

Spanish: El gobierno otorgará fondos adicionales para la educación.
English: The government will grant additional funds for education.

Spanish: Es importante respetar las opiniones de los demás.
English: It's important to respect the opinions of others.

Spanish: Tengo que tratar con clientes difíciles todos los días.
English: I have to deal with difficult clients every day.

Spanish: El equipo de ingenieros logró solucionar el problema técnico.
English: The engineering team managed to solve the technical issue.

Spanish: Un ser humano es capaz de adaptarse a diferentes entornos.
English: A human being is capable of adapting to different environments.

Spanish: Los programas de acogida ofrecen apoyo a los refugiados recién llegados.
English: Reception programs offer support to newly arrived refugees.

Spanish: La repatriación de los ciudadanos varados se está coordinando con las embajadas.
English: The repatriation of stranded citizens is being coordinated with the embassies.

Spanish: Las costumbres locales pueden variar significativamente de un país a otro.
English: Local customs can vary significantly from one country to another.

Spanish: Un comienzo sólido es clave para el éxito a largo plazo.
English: A solid start is key to long-term success.

Spanish: La realidad es que la situación económica es cada vez más difícil.
English: The reality is that the economic situation is becoming increasingly challenging.

Spanish: Los conflictos duran mucho tiempo en esa región.
English: Conflicts last a long time in that region.

Spanish: Los campos de refugiados están abarrotados debido al flujo constante de personas desplazadas.
English: Refugee camps are overcrowded due to the constant flow of displaced people.

Spanish: Los asentamientos permanentes brindan estabilidad a las comunidades desplazadas.
English: Permanent settlements provide stability to displaced communities.

Spanish: Ellos no tienen a donde ir después de perder sus hogares.
English: They have nowhere to go after losing their homes.

Spanish: Ellos no pueden escapar de las bombas que caen sobre la ciudad.
English: They cannot escape from the bombs falling on the city.

Spanish: La falta de agua potable es un problema grave en esa región.
English: The lack of drinking water is a serious problem in that region.

Spanish: El aumento de la temperatura global está teniendo impactos significativos en el clima.
English: The increase in global temperature is having significant impacts on the climate.

Spanish: Los brotes de cólera son una amenaza para la salud pública en situaciones de crisis humanitaria.
English: Cholera outbreaks are a threat to public health in humanitarian crisis situations.

Spanish: La sequía prolongada ha afectado la producción de alimentos en la región.
English: Prolonged drought has affected food production in the region.

Spanish: El hambre es una realidad para millones de personas en todo el mundo.
English: Hunger is a reality for millions of people around the world.

Spanish: El clima político en el país parece empeorar cada día.
English: The political climate in the country seems to worsen every day.

Spanish: Los sabores se mezclan perfectamente en este plato.
English: The flavors blend perfectly in this dish.

Spanish: El grupo planea para apoderarse de la empresa competidora.
English: The group plans to take over the competing company.

Spanish: Los suministros médicos son escasos en la zona afectada.
English: Medical supplies are scarce in the affected area.

Spanish: Nuestra labor es garantizar la seguridad de todos los empleados.
English: Our job is to ensure the safety of all employees.

Spanish: Es necesario procesar los datos antes de analizarlos.
English: It is necessary to process the data before analyzing it.

Spanish: No puedo negar que me equivoqué en esa decisión.
English: I cannot deny that I made a mistake in that decision.

Spanish: El Medio Oriente es conocido por sus conflictos internos.
English: The Middle East is known for its internal conflicts.

Spanish: La lucha por la igualdad de género continúa en todo el mundo.
English: The struggle for gender equality continues worldwide.

Spanish: El proyecto fue exitoso gracias al arduo trabajo del equipo.
English: The project was successful thanks to the hard work of the team.

Spanish: Mi padre finalmente se ha jubilado después de 40 años de trabajo.
English: My father has finally retired after 40 years of work.

Spanish: Voy a cargar las maletas en el coche antes de salir.
English: I am going to load the suitcases into the car before leaving.

Spanish: Los parientes llegaron temprano para la reunión familiar.
English: The relatives arrived early for the family gathering.

Spanish: A los niños les ayuda a distraerse jugar al aire libre.
English: Playing outdoors helps children to distract themselves.

Spanish: Vamos a ver una película en una pantalla grande esta noche.
English: We are going to watch a movie on a big screen tonight.

Spanish: Los altavoces nuevos mejoraron la calidad del sonido.
English: The new speakers improved the sound quality.

Spanish: Puedes estudiar y trabajar al mismo tiempo si te organizas bien.
English: You can study and work at the same time if you organize yourself well.

Spanish: El refugio local se encarga de proporcionar comida a las personas sin hogar.
English: The local shelter is responsible for providing food to the homeless people.

Spanish: La generosidad de la comunidad fue evidente durante la crisis.
English: The generosity of the community was evident during the crisis.

Spanish: En su nuevo hogar, encontraron la paz que tanto anhelaban.
English: In their new home, they found the peace they longed for.

Spanish: Un santuario de ballenas es un lugar crucial para la conservación de estas majestuosas criaturas marinas.
English: A whale sanctuary is a crucial place for the conservation of these majestic marine creatures.

Spanish: Asimismo, es importante recordar la importancia de la conservación del medio ambiente.
English: Likewise, it is important to remember the importance of environmental conservation.

Spanish: Las especies en peligro de extinción necesitan protección urgente para sobrevivir.
English: Endangered species need urgent protection to survive.

Spanish: Las portadas de los periódicos reflejaban la magnitud del desastre natural.
English: The front pages of the newspapers reflected the magnitude of the natural disaster.

Spanish: El volcán hizo erupción repentinamente, causando caos en la región.
English: The volcano erupted suddenly, causing chaos in the region.

Spanish: Compartirlo con el mundo entero es una forma de difundir conciencia sobre el tema.
English: Sharing it with the whole world is a way to spread awareness about the issue.

Spanish: Se convirtieron en una tendencia las protestas pacíficas en todo el país.
English: Peaceful protests became a trend throughout the country.

Spanish: No obstante, debemos seguir luchando por un futuro sostenible.
English: However, we must continue to fight for a sustainable future.

Spanish: El aumento de la deforestación dio paso a una situación de emergencia ambiental.
English: The increase in deforestation led to an environmental emergency situation.

Spanish: La búsqueda de la verdad es fundamental para la justicia.
English: The search for truth is fundamental for justice.

Spanish: Perdieron contacto con ellos después de la tormenta.
English: They lost contact with them after the storm.

Spanish: Tras la publicación de las fotos, la popularidad del artista se disparó.
English: After the publication of the photos, the artist's popularity skyrocketed.

Spanish: Mientras tanto, seguiremos trabajando en la solución del problema.
English: Meanwhile, we will continue working on solving the problem.

Spanish: Está enviando avisos a los residentes para que tomen precauciones ante la tormenta.
English: It is sending notices to the residents to take precautions against the storm.

Spanish: Llevar a cabo el plan de conservación es crucial para proteger la biodiversidad.
English: Carrying out the conservation plan is crucial to protect biodiversity.

Spanish: El cese al fuego es un primer paso hacia la paz en la región.
English: The ceasefire is a first step towards peace in the region.

Spanish: Pierde la oportunidad de aprender algo nuevo si no intentas.
English: You lose the opportunity to learn something new if you don't try.

Spanish: Estar orgulloso de tus logros es importante para la autoestima.
English: Being proud of your accomplishments is important for self-esteem.

Spanish: Enorgulleserse de sus raíces es parte de su identidad.
English: Being proud of their roots is part of their identity.

Spanish: Tener orgullo es importante, pero a veces es necesario ceder.
English: Having pride is important, but sometimes it's necessary to give in.

Spanish: A pesar de los obstáculos, logró alcanzar sus metas.
English: Despite the obstacles, he managed to achieve his goals.

Spanish: En el fondo, todos queremos ser amados y aceptados.
English: Deep down, we all want to be loved and accepted.

Spanish: Dar paso a nuevas ideas es fundamental para el progreso.
English: Making way for new ideas is essential for progress.
